name: BETHESDA CHARITABLE ENDEAVORS

address: 462, Second Floor, Indra Vihar, Mukharjee Nager, Delhi-110009

briefDescription: Bethesda Charitable Endeavorâ€™ (BCE) is a registered society (NGO) of national recognition under the Society Registration Act, 1860 in Delhi in 2006.  This is a non-profit making and social organization and working for the socio- economic development of the community.  Bethesda focuses on socio-economic development of LAPs (Leprosy Affected Peoples) underprivileged and marginalized community without discrimination of caste, color, creed and religion.
